content: मही {@--1@} Earth; as in महीपाल, महीभृत् &c.; मही रम्या शय्या <ls>Bh. 3. 79.</ls> {@--2@} Ground, soil. {@--3@} Landed property or estate, land. {@--4@} A country, kingdom. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a river falling into the gulf of Cambay. {@--6@} (In geom.) The base of any plane figure. {@--7@} A large army (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
